```javascript
// All Link Downloader - Popup Script
// Handles the popup interface and coordinates with content script for file downloading

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    console.log('All Link Downloader popup loaded!');

    // Get references to DOM elements
    const loadingSection = document.getElementById('loadingSection');
    const pageInfo = document.getElementById('pageInfo');
    const pageTitle = document.getElementById('pageTitle');
    const linkStats = document.getElementById('linkStats');
    const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
    const filesList = document.getElementById('filesList');
    const noFilesSection = document.getElementById('noFilesSection');
    const errorSection = document.getElementById('errorSection');
    const errorMessage = document.getElementById('errorMessage');
    const footerInfo = document.getElementById('footerInfo');
    const downloadProgress = document.getElementById('downloadProgress');

    // Control buttons
    const downloadAllBtn = document.getElementById('downloadAllBtn');
    const highlightBtn = document.getElementById('highlightBtn');
    const rescanBtn = document.getElementById('rescanBtn');
    const retryBtn = document.getElementById('retryBtn');
    const fileTypeFilter = document.getElementById('fileTypeFilter');
    const selectAllBtn = document.getElementById('selectAllBtn');
    const selectNoneBtn = document.getElementById('selectNoneBtn');

    // State variables
    let allLinks = [];
    let filteredLinks = [];
    let isHighlighted = false;
    let downloadedCount = 0;

    // File type categorization
    const FILE_CATEGORIES = {
        document: ['pdf', 'doc', 'docx', 'txt', 'rtf', 'odt', 'pages', 'xls', 'xlsx', 'csv', 'ods', 'numbers', 'ppt', 'pptx', 'odp', 'key'],
        archive: ['zip', 'rar', '7z', 'tar', 'gz', 'bz2', 'xz', 'dmg', 'pkg'],
        media: ['mp3', 'wav', 'flac', 'aac', 'ogg', 'm4a', 'mp4', 'avi', 'mkv', 'mov', 'wmv', 'flv', 'webm', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'bmp', 'svg', 'webp', 'tiff'],
        code: ['json', 'xml', 'sql', 'db', 'sqlite', 'js', 'html', 'css', 'py', 'java', 'cpp', 'c', 'h', 'exe', 'msi', 'deb', 'rpm', 'app', 'apk', 'iso', 'img', 'bin', 'log', 'conf', 'cfg']
    };

    // Show different sections
    function showSection(sectionToShow) {
        [loadingSection, pageInfo, controls, filesList, noFilesSection, errorSection].forEach(section => {
            section.classList.add('hidden');
        });
        sectionToShow.classList.remove('hidden');
    }

    // Get file category
    function getFileCategory(extension) {
        for (const [category, extensions] of Object.entries(FILE_CATEGORIES)) {
            if (extensions.includes(extension.toLowerCase())) {
                return category;
            }
        }
        return 'other';
    }

    // Format file size
    function formatFileSize(sizeStr) {
        if (!sizeStr) return 'Unknown size';
        return sizeStr;
    }

        // Create file item HTML
    function createFileItemHTML(link, index) {
        const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
        const displayName = link.fileName.length > 30 ? link.fileName.substring(0, 30) + '...' : link.fileName;
        
        return `
            <div class="file-item" data-index="${index}">
                <div class="file-header">
                    <div class="file-info">
                        <input type="checkbox" class="file-checkbox" id="file-${index}" data-index="${index}" checked>
                        <label for="file-${index}" class="file-name" title="${link.fileName}">${displayName}</label>
                    </div>
                    <span class="file-extension ${category}">${link.extension}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="file-details">
                    <span class="file-size">${formatFileSize(link.fileSize)}</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
    }

        // Render files list
    function renderFilesList(links) {
        if (links.length === 0) {
            showSection(noFilesSection);
            return;
        }
        
        filesList.innerHTML = links.map(createFileItemHTML).join('');
        
        // Add checkbox event handlers
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox').forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.addEventListener('change', updateSelectionStats);
        });
        
        // Add click handlers for file items (toggle checkbox)
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-item').forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                // Don't toggle if clicking on checkbox or label
                if (e.target.type === 'checkbox' || e.target.tagName === 'LABEL') {
                    return;
                }
                
                const checkbox = this.querySelector('.file-checkbox');
                if (checkbox) {
                    checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
                    updateSelectionStats();
                }
            });
        });
        
        showSection(filesList);
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Download a single file
    function downloadFile(url, filename, buttonElement = null) {
        if (buttonElement) {
            buttonElement.disabled = true;
            buttonElement.textContent = 'â³ Downloading...';
        }

        chrome.downloads.download({
            url: url,
            filename: filename,
            saveAs: false
        }, function(downloadId) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.error('Download failed:', chrome.runtime.lastError);
                if (buttonElement) {
                    buttonElement.disabled = false;
                    buttonElement.textContent = 'âŒ Failed';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        buttonElement.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download';
                    }, 2000);
                }
            } else {
                console.log('Download started:', downloadId);
                downloadedCount++;
                updateDownloadProgress();

                if (buttonElement) {
                    buttonElement.textContent = 'âœ… Downloaded';
                    buttonElement.style.background = '#28a745';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        buttonElement.disabled = false;
                        buttonElement.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download';
                        buttonElement.style.background = '';
                    }, 3000);
                }
            }
        });
    }

        // Get selected files
    function getSelectedFiles() {
        const selectedFiles = [];
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox:checked');
        
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            const index = parseInt(checkbox.dataset.index);
            if (filteredLinks[index]) {
                selectedFiles.push(filteredLinks[index]);
            }
        });
        
        return selectedFiles;
    }
    
    // Update selection statistics
    function updateSelectionStats() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        const selectedCount = selectedFiles.length;
        const totalCount = filteredLinks.length;
        
        // Update download button text
        if (selectedCount === 0) {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download Selected (0)';
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;
        } else if (selectedCount === totalCount) {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = `ğŸ“¥ Download All (${selectedCount})`;
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
        } else {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = `ğŸ“¥ Download Selected (${selectedCount})`;
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
        }
        
        // Update footer stats
        if (selectedCount !== totalCount) {
            footerInfo.textContent = `${selectedCount} of ${totalCount} files selected`;
        } else {
            footerInfo.textContent = `Ready (${totalCount} files found)`;
        }
    }
    
    // Download selected files
    function downloadSelectedFiles() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        
        if (selectedFiles.length === 0) {
            return;
        }
        
        downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;
        downloadAllBtn.textContent = 'â³ Downloading...';
        downloadedCount = 0;
        
        downloadProgress.classList.remove('hidden');
        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: 0/${selectedFiles.length}`;
        
        // Download files with a small delay between each to avoid overwhelming the browser
        selectedFiles.forEach((link, index) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                downloadFile(link.url, link.fileName);
            }, index * 100);
        });
        
        // Re-enable button after all downloads are initiated
        setTimeout(() => {
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
            updateSelectionStats();
            setTimeout(() => {
                downloadProgress.classList.add('hidden');
            }, 5000);
        }, selectedFiles.length * 100 + 1000);
    }

    // Update download progress
    function updateDownloadProgress() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: ${downloadedCount}/${selectedFiles.length}`;
    }

    // Filter links by type
    function filterLinks() {
        const filterValue = fileTypeFilter.value;

        if (!filterValue) {
            filteredLinks = [...allLinks];
        } else {
            filteredLinks = allLinks.filter(link => {
                const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
                return category === filterValue;
            });
        }

        renderFilesList(filteredLinks);
        updateStats();
    }

        // Update statistics
    function updateStats() {
        const count = filteredLinks.length;
        const total = allLinks.length;
        
        if (fileTypeFilter.value) {
            linkStats.textContent = `Found ${count} of ${total} files (${fileTypeFilter.value})`;
        } else {
            linkStats.textContent = `Found ${count} downloadable files`;
        }
        
        // Stats will be updated by updateSelectionStats when files are rendered
    }

        // Inject content script if needed
    function injectContentScript(tabId, callback) {
        chrome.scripting.executeScript({
            target: { tabId: tabId },
            files: ['content.js']
        }, function(results) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.error('Failed to inject content script:', chrome.runtime.lastError);
                callback(false);
            } else {
                console.log('Content script injected successfully');
                // Wait a moment for the script to initialize
                setTimeout(() => callback(true), 100);
            }
        });
    }

    // Try to communicate with content script, inject if needed
    function tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab, retryCount = 0) {
        chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: 'scanForFileLinks' }, function(response) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.log('Content script communication failed, attempt:', retryCount + 1);

                if (retryCount < 2) {
                    // Try to inject the content script
                    footerInfo.textContent = 'Initializing scanner...';
                    injectContentScript(activeTab.id, function(success) {
                        if (success) {
                            // Retry communication after injection
                            setTimeout(() => tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab, retryCount + 1), 200);
                        } else {
                            showError('Unable to initialize page scanner. This page may restrict extensions.');
                        }
                    });
                } else {
                    showError('Unable to scan this page. Please refresh the page and try again.');
                }
                return;
            }

            // Content script responded successfully
            if (response && response.success) {
                allLinks = response.links || [];
                filteredLinks = [...allLinks];

                // Update page info
                pageTitle.textContent = response.pageTitle || 'Current Page';
                pageInfo.classList.remove('hidden');
                controls.classList.remove('hidden');

                // Render results
                if (allLinks.length === 0) {
                    showSection(noFilesSection);
                } else {
                    renderFilesList(filteredLinks);
                }

                updateStats();
                footerInfo.textContent = `Ready (${allLinks.length} files found)`;
            } else {
                showError(response ? response.error : 'Scanner returned no results');
            }
        });
    }

    // Scan current page for links
    function scanCurrentPage() {
        showSection(loadingSection);
        footerInfo.textContent = 'Scanning page...';

        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) {
                showError('No active tab found');
                return;
            }

            const activeTab = tabs[0];

            // Check if we can access this page
            if (activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome-extension://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('edge://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('about:') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('moz-extension://')) {
                showError('Cannot scan browser internal pages or extension pages');
                return;
            }

            // Check for other restricted URLs
            if (activeTab.url === 'about:blank' || activeTab.url === '') {
                showError('Cannot scan blank or empty pages');
                return;
            }

            // Try to communicate with content script
            tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab);
        });
    }

    // Show error
    function showError(message) {
        errorMessage.textContent = message;
        showSection(errorSection);
        footerInfo.textContent = 'Error occurred';
    }

        // Toggle link highlighting
    function toggleHighlighting() {
        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) return;

            const activeTab = tabs[0];
            const action = isHighlighted ? 'removeHighlight' : 'highlightLinks';

            chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {
                if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                    console.log('Highlight communication failed, trying to inject script...');
                    injectContentScript(activeTab.id, function(success) {
                        if (success) {
                            // Retry highlight after injection
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {
                                    if (response && response.success) {
                                        isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                                        highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                                    }
                                });
                            }, 100);
                        }
                    });
                } else if (response && response.success) {
                    isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                    highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                }
            });
        });
    }

    // Select all files
    function selectAllFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = true;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }
    
    // Select no files
    function selectNoFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = false;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }
    
    // Event listeners
    downloadAllBtn.addEventListener('click', downloadSelectedFiles);
    highlightBtn.addEventListener('click', toggleHighlighting);
    rescanBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    retryBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    fileTypeFilter.addEventListener('change', filterLinks);
    selectAllBtn.addEventListener('click', selectAllFiles);
    selectNoneBtn.addEventListener('click', selectNoFiles);

    // Keyboard shortcuts
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
        if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'd' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            if (!downloadAllBtn.disabled) {
                downloadSelectedFiles();
            }
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'h' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            toggleHighlighting();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'r' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            scanCurrentPage();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'a' && (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey)) {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectAllFiles();
        } else if (event.key === 'Escape') {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectNoFiles();
        }
    });

    // Initialize
    scanCurrentPage();
});

// Error handling
window.addEventListener('error', function(event) {
    console.error('Popup error:', event.error);
});

window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function(event) {
    console.error('Unhandled promise rejection:', event.reason);
});

```markdown
# All Link Downloader - Chrome Extension

A powerful Chrome extension that scans webpages for downloadable files and lets you download them all with one click. Built with Manifest V3 and modern web technologies.

## ğŸš€ Features

- **Smart File Detection**: Automatically finds all downloadable file links on any webpage
- **Selective Downloads**: Choose which files to download with checkboxes, then download all selected files with one click
- **File Type Filtering**: Filter files by category (Documents, Archives, Media, Code)
- **Visual Highlighting**: Highlight downloadable links directly on the webpage
- **Modern UI**: Clean, responsive interface with real-time file information
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Press 'd' to download all, 'h' to highlight, 'r' to rescan
- **Progress Tracking**: See download progress and status in real-time
- **Cross-Platform**: Works on any website that contains downloadable file links

## ğŸ“ Project Structure

```
all_link_downloader/
â”œâ”€â”€ manifest.json          # Extension configuration with download permissions
â”œâ”€â”€ popup.html            # Main popup interface with file list
â”œâ”€â”€ popup.css             # Modern styling for file display
â”œâ”€â”€ popup.js              # Download logic and UI management
â”œâ”€â”€ content.js            # Content script for webpage scanning
â”œâ”€â”€ icons/                # Extension icons (16px, 32px, 48px, 128px)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ icon16.png        # Complete icon set
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ icon32.png
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ icon48.png
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ icon128.png
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ icon.svg          # Source SVG file
â”œâ”€â”€ doc/                  # Project documentation
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ all_link_downloader.md
â””â”€â”€ README.md             # This file
```

## ğŸ› ï¸ Installation

### Step 1: Clone or Download
```bash
git clone <repository-url>
cd all_link_downloader
```

### Step 2: Load Extension in Chrome

1. **Open Chrome** and navigate to `chrome://extensions/`

2. **Enable Developer Mode** by toggling the switch in the top-right corner

3. **Load Unpacked Extension**:
   - Click "Load unpacked" button
   - Select the `all_link_downloader` folder
   - The extension should now appear in your extensions list

4. **Pin the Extension** (optional):
   - Click the puzzle piece icon in Chrome toolbar
   - Find "All Link Downloader - Hello World"
   - Click the pin icon to pin it to your toolbar

## ğŸ¯ Usage

### How to Use

1. **Navigate to any webpage** that contains downloadable files
2. **Click the All Link Downloader icon** in your Chrome toolbar
3. **Wait for the scan** - the extension will automatically find all downloadable files
4. **Choose your action**:
   - **ğŸ“¥ Download All**: Download all found files at once
   - **ğŸ” Highlight Links**: Visually highlight downloadable links on the page
   - **Individual Downloads**: Click any file to download it individually

### Supported File Types

The extension automatically detects these file types:

- **ğŸ“„ Documents**: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, etc.
- **ğŸ“¦ Archives**: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZ, DMG, etc.
- **ğŸµ Media**: MP3, MP4, AVI, JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.
- **ğŸ’» Code/Data**: JSON, XML, SQL, JS, HTML, CSS, etc.

### Keyboard Shortcuts

- Press `d` â†’ Download all files
- Press `h` â†’ Toggle link highlighting
- Press `r` â†’ Rescan the current page

### Filter Options

- **All files**: Show all detected downloadable files
- **Documents**: Show only document files
- **Archives**: Show only compressed/archive files
- **Media**: Show only audio, video, and image files
- **Code**: Show only code and data files

### What This Extension Does

- âœ… **Content Scanning**: Analyzes webpage DOM for downloadable file links
- âœ… **Smart Detection**: Identifies files by extension and context
- âœ… **Bulk Downloads**: Uses Chrome Downloads API for efficient downloading
- âœ… **Visual Feedback**: Real-time progress and status updates
- âœ… **Page Integration**: Highlights links directly on the webpage
- âœ… **Error Handling**: Graceful handling of permissions and network issues

## ğŸ”§ Development

### Adding Icons (Optional)

Currently, the extension works without custom icons and will use Chrome's default extension icon. To add custom icons:

1. Create PNG files in these sizes in the `icons/` directory:
   - `icon16.png` (16x16 pixels)
   - `icon32.png` (32x32 pixels)
   - `icon48.png` (48x48 pixels)
   - `icon128.png` (128x128 pixels)

2. Add the icon references back to `manifest.json`:
   ```json
   "action": {
     "default_popup": "popup.html",
     "default_title": "All Link Downloader",
     "default_icon": {
       "16": "icons/icon16.png",
       "32": "icons/icon32.png",
       "48": "icons/icon48.png",
       "128": "icons/icon128.png"
     }
   },
   "icons": {
     "16": "icons/icon16.png",
     "32": "icons/icon32.png",
     "48": "icons/icon48.png",
     "128": "icons/icon128.png"
   }
   ```

3. Use online tools like:
   - [Favicon Generator](https://www.favicon-generator.org/)
   - [RealFaviconGenerator](https://realfavicongenerator.net/)

### Modifying the Extension

1. **Edit Files**: Modify `popup.html`, `popup.css`, or `popup.js`
2. **Reload Extension**: Go to `chrome://extensions/` and click the reload icon
3. **Test Changes**: Click the extension icon to see your changes

### Adding More Functionality

To expand this extension, you can:

- **Add Content Scripts**: Interact with webpage content
- **Add Background Scripts**: Run persistent background tasks
- **Use More APIs**: Storage, notifications, bookmarks, etc.
- **Add Options Page**: Let users customize settings

## ğŸ“š Learning Resources

- [Chrome Extension Developer Guide](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/)
- [Manifest V3 Migration Guide](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/mv3/)
- [Chrome Extension APIs Reference](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/extensions/reference/)
- [Extension Samples](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/chrome-extensions-samples)

## ğŸ› Troubleshooting

### Extension Won't Load
- Check that all files are present
- Verify `manifest.json` syntax is correct
- Look for errors in `chrome://extensions/` page

### Popup Won't Open
- Ensure `popup.html` exists and is properly formatted
- Check browser console for JavaScript errors

```css
/* Reset and base styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: #333;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    min-height: 100vh;
}

/* Container */
.container {
    width: 380px;
    min-height: 500px;
    max-height: 600px;
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    overflow: hidden;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

/* Header */
.header {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
}

.header h1 {
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    letter-spacing: -0.5px;
}

.subtitle {
    font-size: 12px;
    opacity: 0.9;
    font-weight: 400;
}

/* Main content */
.main-content {
    padding: 20px;
    flex: 1;
}

.welcome-section {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.welcome-section h2 {
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #2c3e50;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.welcome-section p {
    color: #666;
    line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Features section */
.features-section {
    margin-bottom: 25px;
}

.features-section h3 {
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #2c3e50;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.features-section ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding-left: 0;
}

.features-section li {
    padding: 5px 0;
    color: #555;
    font-size: 14px;
}

/* Actions section */
.actions-section {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 10px;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
    padding: 12px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: inline-block;
}

.btn-primary {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
}

.btn-secondary {
    background: #f8f9fa;
    color: #495057;
    border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
    background: #e9ecef;
    transform: translateY(-1px);
    box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.btn:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Output section */
.output-section {
    min-height: 50px;
    padding: 15px;
    background: #f8f9fa;
    border-radius: 8px;
    border-left: 4px solid #667eea;
    margin-top: 15px;
    display: none;
}

.output-section.show {
    display: block;
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
}

.output-section h4 {
    color: #2c3e50;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    font-size: 14px;
}

.output-section p {
    color: #666;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 1.5;
}

/* Footer */
.footer {
    background: #f8f9fa;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    text-align: center;
    border-top: 1px solid #e9ecef;
}

.footer p {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #6c757d;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(10px);
    }
    to {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}

/* Loading Section */
.loading-section {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 40px 20px;
}

.spinner {
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    border: 3px solid #f3f3f3;
    border-top: 3px solid #667eea;
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
    margin: 0 auto 15px;
}

@keyframes spin {

```javascript
// All Link Downloader - Popup Script
// Handles the popup interface and coordinates with content script for file downloading

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    console.log('All Link Downloader popup loaded!');

    // Get references to DOM elements
    const loadingSection = document.getElementById('loadingSection');
    const pageInfo = document.getElementById('pageInfo');
    const pageTitle = document.getElementById('pageTitle');
    const linkStats = document.getElementById('linkStats');
    const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
    const filesList = document.getElementById('filesList');
    const noFilesSection = document.getElementById('noFilesSection');
    const errorSection = document.getElementById('errorSection');
    const errorMessage = document.getElementById('errorMessage');
    const footerInfo = document.getElementById('footerInfo');
    const downloadProgress = document.getElementById('downloadProgress');

    // Control buttons
    const downloadAllBtn = document.getElementById('downloadAllBtn');
    const highlightBtn = document.getElementById('highlightBtn');
    const rescanBtn = document.getElementById('rescanBtn');
    const retryBtn = document.getElementById('retryBtn');
    const fileTypeFilter = document.getElementById('fileTypeFilter');
    const selectAllBtn = document.getElementById('selectAllBtn');
    const selectNoneBtn = document.getElementById('selectNoneBtn');

    // State variables
    let allLinks = [];
    let filteredLinks = [];
    let isHighlighted = false;
    let downloadedCount = 0;

    // File type categorization
    const FILE_CATEGORIES = {
        document: ['pdf', 'doc', 'docx', 'txt', 'rtf', 'odt', 'pages', 'xls', 'xlsx', 'csv', 'ods', 'numbers', 'ppt', 'pptx', 'odp', 'key'],
        archive: ['zip', 'rar', '7z', 'tar', 'gz', 'bz2', 'xz', 'dmg', 'pkg'],
        media: ['mp3', 'wav', 'flac', 'aac', 'ogg', 'm4a', 'mp4', 'avi', 'mkv', 'mov', 'wmv', 'flv', 'webm', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'bmp', 'svg', 'webp', 'tiff'],
        code: ['json', 'xml', 'sql', 'db', 'sqlite', 'js', 'html', 'css', 'py', 'java', 'cpp', 'c', 'h', 'exe', 'msi', 'deb', 'rpm', 'app', 'apk', 'iso', 'img', 'bin', 'log', 'conf', 'cfg']
    };

    // Show different sections
    function showSection(sectionToShow) {
        [loadingSection, pageInfo, controls, filesList, noFilesSection, errorSection].forEach(section => {
            section.classList.add('hidden');
        });
        sectionToShow.classList.remove('hidden');
    }

    // Get file category
    function getFileCategory(extension) {
        for (const [category, extensions] of Object.entries(FILE_CATEGORIES)) {
            if (extensions.includes(extension.toLowerCase())) {
                return category;
            }
        }
        return 'other';
    }

    // Format file size
    function formatFileSize(sizeStr) {
        if (!sizeStr) return 'Unknown size';
        return sizeStr;
    }

        // Create file item HTML
    function createFileItemHTML(link, index) {
        const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
        const displayName = link.fileName.length > 30 ? link.fileName.substring(0, 30) + '...' : link.fileName;

        return `
            <div class="file-item" data-index="${index}">
                <div class="file-header">
                    <div class="file-info">
                        <input type="checkbox" class="file-checkbox" id="file-${index}" data-index="${index}" checked>
                        <label for="file-${index}" class="file-name" title="${link.fileName}">${displayName}</label>
                    </div>
                    <span class="file-extension ${category}">${link.extension}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="file-details">
                    <span class="file-size">${formatFileSize(link.fileSize)}</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
    }

        // Render files list
    function renderFilesList(links) {
        if (links.length === 0) {
            showSection(noFilesSection);
            return;
        }

        filesList.innerHTML = links.map(createFileItemHTML).join('');

        // Add checkbox event handlers
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox').forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.addEventListener('change', updateSelectionStats);
        });

        // Add click handlers for file items (toggle checkbox)
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-item').forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                // Don't toggle if clicking on checkbox or label
                if (e.target.type === 'checkbox' || e.target.tagName === 'LABEL') {
                    return;
                }

                const checkbox = this.querySelector('.file-checkbox');
                if (checkbox) {
                    checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
                    updateSelectionStats();
                }
            });
        });

        showSection(filesList);
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Download a single file
    function downloadFile(url, filename, buttonElement = null) {
        if (buttonElement) {
            buttonElement.disabled = true;
            buttonElement.textContent = 'â³ Downloading...';
        }

        chrome.downloads.download({
            url: url,
            filename: filename,
            saveAs: false
        }, function(downloadId) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.error('Download failed:', chrome.runtime.lastError);
                if (buttonElement) {
                    buttonElement.disabled = false;
                    buttonElement.textContent = 'âŒ Failed';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        buttonElement.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download';
                    }, 2000);
                }
            } else {
                console.log('Download started:', downloadId);
                downloadedCount++;
                updateDownloadProgress();

                if (buttonElement) {
                    buttonElement.textContent = 'âœ… Downloaded';
                    buttonElement.style.background = '#28a745';
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        buttonElement.disabled = false;
                        buttonElement.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download';
                        buttonElement.style.background = '';
                    }, 3000);
                }
            }
        });
    }

        // Get selected files
    function getSelectedFiles() {
        const selectedFiles = [];
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox:checked');

        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            const index = parseInt(checkbox.dataset.index);
            if (filteredLinks[index]) {
                selectedFiles.push(filteredLinks[index]);
            }
        });

        return selectedFiles;
    }

    // Update selection statistics
    function updateSelectionStats() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        const selectedCount = selectedFiles.length;
        const totalCount = filteredLinks.length;

        // Update download button text
        if (selectedCount === 0) {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download (0)';
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;
        } else {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = `ğŸ“¥ Download (${selectedCount})`;
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
        }

        // Update footer stats
        if (selectedCount !== totalCount) {
            footerInfo.textContent = `${selectedCount} of ${totalCount} files selected`;
        } else {
            footerInfo.textContent = `Ready (${totalCount} files found)`;
        }
    }

    // Download selected files
    function downloadSelectedFiles() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();

        if (selectedFiles.length === 0) {
            return;
        }

        downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;
        downloadAllBtn.textContent = 'â³ Downloading...';
        downloadedCount = 0;

        downloadProgress.classList.remove('hidden');
        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: 0/${selectedFiles.length}`;

        // Download files with a small delay between each to avoid overwhelming the browser
        selectedFiles.forEach((link, index) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                downloadFile(link.url, link.fileName);
            }, index * 100);
        });

        // Re-enable button after all downloads are initiated
        setTimeout(() => {
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
            updateSelectionStats();
            setTimeout(() => {
                downloadProgress.classList.add('hidden');
            }, 5000);
        }, selectedFiles.length * 100 + 1000);
    }

    // Update download progress
    function updateDownloadProgress() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: ${downloadedCount}/${selectedFiles.length}`;
    }

    // Filter links by type
    function filterLinks() {
        const filterValue = fileTypeFilter.value;

        if (!filterValue) {
            filteredLinks = [...allLinks];
        } else {
            filteredLinks = allLinks.filter(link => {
                const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
                return category === filterValue;
            });
        }

        renderFilesList(filteredLinks);
        updateStats();
    }

        // Update statistics
    function updateStats() {
        const count = filteredLinks.length;
        const total = allLinks.length;

        if (fileTypeFilter.value) {
            linkStats.textContent = `Found ${count} of ${total} files (${fileTypeFilter.value})`;
        } else {
            linkStats.textContent = `Found ${count} downloadable files`;
        }

        // Stats will be updated by updateSelectionStats when files are rendered
    }

        // Inject content script if needed
    function injectContentScript(tabId, callback) {
        chrome.scripting.executeScript({
            target: { tabId: tabId },
            files: ['content.js']
        }, function(results) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.error('Failed to inject content script:', chrome.runtime.lastError);
                callback(false);
            } else {
                console.log('Content script injected successfully');
                // Wait a moment for the script to initialize
                setTimeout(() => callback(true), 100);
            }
        });
    }

    // Try to communicate with content script, inject if needed
    function tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab, retryCount = 0) {
        chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: 'scanForFileLinks' }, function(response) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.log('Content script communication failed, attempt:', retryCount + 1);

                if (retryCount < 2) {
                    // Try to inject the content script
                    footerInfo.textContent = 'Initializing scanner...';
                    injectContentScript(activeTab.id, function(success) {
                        if (success) {
                            // Retry communication after injection
                            setTimeout(() => tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab, retryCount + 1), 200);
                        } else {
                            showError('Unable to initialize page scanner. This page may restrict extensions.');
                        }
                    });
                } else {
                    showError('Unable to scan this page. Please refresh the page and try again.');
                }
                return;
            }

            // Content script responded successfully
            if (response && response.success) {
                allLinks = response.links || [];
                filteredLinks = [...allLinks];

                // Update page info
                pageTitle.textContent = response.pageTitle || 'Current Page';
                pageInfo.classList.remove('hidden');
                controls.classList.remove('hidden');

                // Render results
                if (allLinks.length === 0) {
                    showSection(noFilesSection);
                } else {
                    renderFilesList(filteredLinks);
                }

                updateStats();
                footerInfo.textContent = `Ready (${allLinks.length} files found)`;
            } else {
                showError(response ? response.error : 'Scanner returned no results');
            }
        });
    }

    // Scan current page for links
    function scanCurrentPage() {
        showSection(loadingSection);
        footerInfo.textContent = 'Scanning page...';

        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) {
                showError('No active tab found');
                return;
            }

            const activeTab = tabs[0];

            // Check if we can access this page
            if (activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome-extension://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('edge://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('about:') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('moz-extension://')) {
                showError('Cannot scan browser internal pages or extension pages');
                return;
            }

            // Check for other restricted URLs
            if (activeTab.url === 'about:blank' || activeTab.url === '') {
                showError('Cannot scan blank or empty pages');
                return;
            }

            // Try to communicate with content script
            tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab);
        });
    }

    // Show error
    function showError(message) {
        errorMessage.textContent = message;
        showSection(errorSection);
        footerInfo.textContent = 'Error occurred';
    }

        // Toggle link highlighting
    function toggleHighlighting() {
        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) return;

            const activeTab = tabs[0];
            const action = isHighlighted ? 'removeHighlight' : 'highlightLinks';

            chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {
                if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                    console.log('Highlight communication failed, trying to inject script...');
                    injectContentScript(activeTab.id, function(success) {
                        if (success) {
                            // Retry highlight after injection
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {
                                    if (response && response.success) {
                                        isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                                        highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                                    }
                                });
                            }, 100);
                        }
                    });
                } else if (response && response.success) {
                    isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                    highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                }
            });
        });
    }

    // Select all files
    function selectAllFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = true;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Select no files
    function selectNoFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = false;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Event listeners
    downloadAllBtn.addEventListener('click', downloadSelectedFiles);
    highlightBtn.addEventListener('click', toggleHighlighting);
    rescanBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    retryBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    fileTypeFilter.addEventListener('change', filterLinks);
    selectAllBtn.addEventListener('click', selectAllFiles);
    selectNoneBtn.addEventListener('click', selectNoFiles);

    // Keyboard shortcuts
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
        if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'd' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            if (!downloadAllBtn.disabled) {
                downloadSelectedFiles();
            }
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'h' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            toggleHighlighting();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'r' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            scanCurrentPage();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'a' && (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey)) {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectAllFiles();
        } else if (event.key === 'Escape') {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectNoFiles();
        }
    });

    // Initialize
    scanCurrentPage();
});

// Error handling
window.addEventListener('error', function(event) {
    console.error('Popup error:', event.error);
});

window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function(event) {
    console.error('Unhandled promise rejection:', event.reason);
});

```css
/* Reset and base styles */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: #333;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    min-height: 100vh;
}

/* Container */
.container {
    width: 380px;
    min-height: 500px;
    max-height: 600px;
    background: white;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

}

.subtitle {
    font-size: 12px;
    opacity: 0.9;
    font-weight: 400;
}

/* Main content */
.main-content {
    padding: 20px;

}

.welcome-section {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.welcome-section h2 {
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #2c3e50;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    font-weight: 600;
}

.welcome-section p {
    color: #666;
    line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Features section */
.features-section {
    margin-bottom: 25px;
}

.features-section h3 {
    font-size: 16px;

}

.features-section ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding-left: 0;
}

.features-section li {

    font-size: 14px;
}

/* Actions section */
.actions-section {
    margin-bottom: 20px;

    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 10px;
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
    padding: 12px 20px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;

.btn-primary {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);

}

.btn-primary:hover {

.btn-secondary {

.btn-secondary:hover {

}

}

/* Output section */
.output-section {
    min-height: 50px;

    border-left: 4px solid #667eea;

}

.output-section.show {

.output-section h4 {

/* Animations */

}

/* Files List */
.files-list {

}

.file-item {

/* No Files Section */

```javascript
// All Link Downloader - Popup Script
// Handles the popup interface and coordinates with content script for file downloading

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    console.log('All Link Downloader popup loaded!');

    // Get references to DOM elements
    const loadingSection = document.getElementById('loadingSection');
    const pageInfo = document.getElementById('pageInfo');
    const pageTitle = document.getElementById('pageTitle');
    const linkStats = document.getElementById('linkStats');
    const controls = document.getElementById('controls');
    const filesList = document.getElementById('filesList');
    const noFilesSection = document.getElementById('noFilesSection');
    const errorSection = document.getElementById('errorSection');
    const errorMessage = document.getElementById('errorMessage');
    const footerInfo = document.getElementById('footerInfo');
    const downloadProgress = document.getElementById('downloadProgress');

    // Control buttons
    const downloadAllBtn = document.getElementById('downloadAllBtn');
    const highlightBtn = document.getElementById('highlightBtn');
    const rescanBtn = document.getElementById('rescanBtn');
    const noFilesRescanBtn = document.getElementById('noFilesRescanBtn');
    const retryBtn = document.getElementById('retryBtn');
    const fileTypeFilter = document.getElementById('fileTypeFilter');
    const selectAllBtn = document.getElementById('selectAllBtn');
    const selectNoneBtn = document.getElementById('selectNoneBtn');

    // State variables
    let allLinks = [];
    let filteredLinks = [];
    let isHighlighted = false;
    let downloadedCount = 0;

    // File type categorization
    const FILE_CATEGORIES = {
        document: ['pdf', 'doc', 'docx', 'txt', 'rtf', 'odt', 'pages', 'xls', 'xlsx', 'csv', 'ods', 'numbers', 'ppt', 'pptx', 'odp', 'key'],
        archive: ['zip', 'rar', '7z', 'tar', 'gz', 'bz2', 'xz', 'dmg', 'pkg'],
        media: ['mp3', 'wav', 'flac', 'aac', 'ogg', 'm4a', 'mp4', 'avi', 'mkv', 'mov', 'wmv', 'flv', 'webm', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'bmp', 'svg', 'webp', 'tiff'],
        code: ['json', 'xml', 'sql', 'db', 'sqlite', 'js', 'html', 'css', 'py', 'java', 'cpp', 'c', 'h', 'exe', 'msi', 'deb', 'rpm', 'app', 'apk', 'iso', 'img', 'bin', 'log', 'conf', 'cfg']
    };

    // Show different sections
    function showSection(sectionToShow) {
        [loadingSection, pageInfo, controls, filesList, noFilesSection, errorSection].forEach(section => {
            section.classList.add('hidden');
        });
        sectionToShow.classList.remove('hidden');
    }

    // Get file category
    function getFileCategory(extension) {
        for (const [category, extensions] of Object.entries(FILE_CATEGORIES)) {
            if (extensions.includes(extension.toLowerCase())) {
                return category;
            }
        }
        return 'other';
    }

    // Format file size
    function formatFileSize(sizeStr) {
        if (!sizeStr) return 'Unknown size';
        return sizeStr;
    }

        // Create file item HTML
    function createFileItemHTML(link, index) {
        const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
        const displayName = link.fileName.length > 30 ? link.fileName.substring(0, 30) + '...' : link.fileName;

        return `
            <div class="file-item" data-index="${index}">
                <div class="file-header">
                    <div class="file-info">
                        <input type="checkbox" class="file-checkbox" id="file-${index}" data-index="${index}" checked>
                        <label for="file-${index}" class="file-name" title="${link.fileName}">${displayName}</label>
                    </div>
                    <span class="file-extension ${category}">${link.extension}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="file-details">
                    <span class="file-size">${formatFileSize(link.fileSize)}</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
    }

        // Render files list
    function renderFilesList(links) {
        if (links.length === 0) {
            showSection(noFilesSection);
            return;
        }

        filesList.innerHTML = links.map(createFileItemHTML).join('');

        // Add checkbox event handlers
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox').forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.addEventListener('change', updateSelectionStats);
        });

        // Add click handlers for file items (toggle checkbox)
        filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-item').forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                // Don't toggle if clicking on checkbox or label
                if (e.target.type === 'checkbox' || e.target.tagName === 'LABEL') {
                    return;
                }

                const checkbox = this.querySelector('.file-checkbox');
                if (checkbox) {
                    checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
                    updateSelectionStats();
                }
            });
        });

        showSection(filesList);
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Download a single file
    function downloadFile(url, filename, buttonElement = null) {
        if (buttonElement) {
            buttonElement.disabled = true;
            buttonElement.textContent = 'â³ Downloading...';
        }

        chrome.downloads.download({
            url: url,
            filename: filename,
            saveAs: false
        }, function(downloadId) {
            if (chrome.runtime.lastError) {
                console.error('Download failed:', chrome.runtime.lastError);
                if (buttonElement) {
                    buttonElement.disabled = false;
                    buttonElement.textContent = 'âŒ Failed';

        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox:checked');

        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            const index = parseInt(checkbox.dataset.index);
            if (filteredLinks[index]) {
                selectedFiles.push(filteredLinks[index]);
            }
        });

        return selectedFiles;
    }

    function updateSelectionStats() {
        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();
        const selectedCount = selectedFiles.length;
        const totalCount = filteredLinks.length;

        if (selectedCount === 0) {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“¥ Download (0)';
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;
        } else {
            downloadAllBtn.textContent = `ğŸ“¥ Download (${selectedCount})`;
            downloadAllBtn.disabled = false;
        }

        // Update footer stats
        if (selectedCount !== totalCount) {
            footerInfo.textContent = `${selectedCount} of ${totalCount} files selected`;
        } else {
            footerInfo.textContent = `Ready (${totalCount} files found)`;
        }
    }

        const selectedFiles = getSelectedFiles();

        if (selectedFiles.length === 0) {
            return;

        downloadAllBtn.disabled = true;

        downloadedCount = 0;

        downloadProgress.classList.remove('hidden');
        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: 0/${selectedFiles.length}`;

        selectedFiles.forEach((link, index) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                downloadFile(link.url, link.fileName);
            }, index * 100);

        setTimeout(() => {

        downloadProgress.textContent = `Downloaded: ${downloadedCount}/${selectedFiles.length}`;

    function filterLinks() {

        if (!filterValue) {
            filteredLinks = [...allLinks];

            filteredLinks = allLinks.filter(link => {
                const category = getFileCategory(link.extension);
                return category === filterValue;
            });
        }

        renderFilesList(filteredLinks);
        updateStats();
    }

    function updateStats() {

                setTimeout(() => callback(true), 100);
            }
        });
    }

        chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: 'scanForFileLinks' }, function(response) {

                console.log('Content script communication failed, attempt:', retryCount + 1);

                    // Try to inject the content script
                    footerInfo.textContent = 'Initializing scanner...';

                        if (success) {
                            // Retry communication after injection

                        } else {

                        }
                    });
                } else {

                return;
            }

            // Content script responded successfully
            if (response && response.success) {
                allLinks = response.links || [];
                filteredLinks = [...allLinks];

                // Update page info
                pageTitle.textContent = response.pageTitle || 'Current Page';
                pageInfo.classList.remove('hidden');
                controls.classList.remove('hidden');

                if (allLinks.length === 0) {
                    showSection(noFilesSection);

            } else {
                showError(response ? response.error : 'Scanner returned no results');
            }
        });

    function scanCurrentPage() {
        showSection(loadingSection);

        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) {
                showError('No active tab found');
                return;
            }

            const activeTab = tabs[0];

            // Check if we can access this page
            if (activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('chrome-extension://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('edge://') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('about:') ||
                activeTab.url.startsWith('moz-extension://')) {
                showError('Cannot scan browser internal pages or extension pages');
                return;
            }

            // Check for other restricted URLs
            if (activeTab.url === 'about:blank' || activeTab.url === '') {

                return;
            }

            // Try to communicate with content script
            tryContentScriptCommunication(activeTab);
        });
    }

    function showError(message) {

        footerInfo.textContent = 'Error occurred';
    }

    function toggleHighlighting() {
        chrome.tabs.query({ active: true, currentWindow: true }, function(tabs) {
            if (tabs.length === 0) return;

            const activeTab = tabs[0];
            const action = isHighlighted ? 'removeHighlight' : 'highlightLinks';

            chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {

                    injectContentScript(activeTab.id, function(success) {

                            setTimeout(() => {
                                chrome.tabs.sendMessage(activeTab.id, { action: action }, function(response) {
                                    if (response && response.success) {
                                        isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                                        highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                                    }
                                });
                            }, 100);
                        }
                    });
                } else if (response && response.success) {
                    isHighlighted = !isHighlighted;
                    highlightBtn.textContent = isHighlighted ? 'âŒ Remove Highlight' : 'ğŸ” Highlight Links';
                }
            });
        });
    }

    function selectAllFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = true;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Select no files
    function selectNoFiles() {
        const checkboxes = filesList.querySelectorAll('.file-checkbox');
        checkboxes.forEach(checkbox => {
            checkbox.checked = false;
        });
        updateSelectionStats();
    }

    // Event listeners
    downloadAllBtn.addEventListener('click', downloadSelectedFiles);
    highlightBtn.addEventListener('click', toggleHighlighting);
    rescanBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    retryBtn.addEventListener('click', scanCurrentPage);
    fileTypeFilter.addEventListener('change', filterLinks);
    selectAllBtn.addEventListener('click', selectAllFiles);
    selectNoneBtn.addEventListener('click', selectNoFiles);

    // Keyboard shortcuts
    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
        if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'd' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            if (!downloadAllBtn.disabled) {
                downloadSelectedFiles();
            }
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'h' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            toggleHighlighting();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'r' && !event.ctrlKey && !event.metaKey) {
            event.preventDefault();
            scanCurrentPage();
        } else if (event.key.toLowerCase() === 'a' && (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey)) {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectAllFiles();
        } else if (event.key === 'Escape') {
            event.preventDefault();
            selectNoFiles();
        }
    });

    // Initialize
    scanCurrentPage();
});

// Error handling
window.addEventListener('error', function(event) {
    console.error('Popup error:', event.error);
});

window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', function(event) {
    console.error('Unhandled promise rejection:', event.reason);
});

```markdown
# All Link Downloader - Chrome Extension

A powerful Chrome extension that scans webpages for downloadable files and lets you download them all with one click. Built with Manifest V3 and modern web technologies.

## ğŸš€ Features

- **Smart File Detection**: Automatically finds all downloadable file links on any webpage
- **Selective Downloads**: Choose which files to download with checkboxes, then download all selected files with one click
- **File Type Filtering**: Filter files by category (Documents, Archives, Media, Code)
- **Visual Highlighting**: Highlight downloadable links directly on the webpage
- **Modern UI**: Clean, responsive interface with real-time file information
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Press 'd' to download all, 'h' to highlight, 'r' to rescan
- **Progress Tracking**: See download progress and status in real-time
- **Cross-Platform**: Works on any website that contains downloadable file links

## ğŸ“ Project Structure

```

â”œâ”€â”€ popup.html            # Main popup interface with file list
â”œâ”€â”€ popup.css             # Modern styling for file display
â”œâ”€â”€ popup.js              # Download logic and UI management
â”œâ”€â”€ content.js            # Content script for webpage scanning

## ğŸ› ï¸ Installation

### Step 1: Clone or Download
```bash
git clone <repository-url>
cd all_link_downloader
```

### Step 2: Load Extension in Chrome

1. **Open Chrome** and navigate to `chrome://extensions/`

2. **Enable Developer Mode** by toggling the switch in the top-right corner

3. **Load Unpacked Extension**:
   - Click "Load unpacked" button
   - Select the `all_link_downloader` folder
   - The extension should now appear in your extensions list

4. **Pin the Extension** (optional):
   - Click the puzzle piece icon in Chrome toolbar
   - Find "All Link Downloader - Hello World"
   - Click the pin icon to pin it to your toolbar

## ğŸ¯ Usage

### How to Use

1. **Navigate to any webpage** that contains downloadable files
2. **Click the All Link Downloader icon** in your Chrome toolbar
3. **Wait for the scan** - the extension will automatically find all downloadable files
4. **Select files to download** - use checkboxes to choose which files you want (all selected by default)
5. **Use the organized control buttons**:
   - **âœ… Select All**: Check all files for download
   - **âŒ Deselect All**: Uncheck all files  
   - **ğŸ“¥ Download**: Download all selected files at once
   - **ğŸ”„ Rescan**: Re-scan the current page for new files
   - **ğŸ” Highlight Links**: Visually highlight downloadable links on the page
   - **Filter dropdown**: Show only specific file types

### Supported File Types

The extension automatically detects these file types:

- **ğŸ“„ Documents**: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, etc.
- **ğŸ“¦ Archives**: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, TAR, GZ, DMG, etc.
- **ğŸµ Media**: MP3, MP4, AVI, JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.
- **ğŸ’» Code/Data**: JSON, XML, SQL, JS, HTML, CSS, etc.

### Keyboard Shortcuts

- Press `d` â†’ Download selected files
- Press `h` â†’ Toggle link highlighting
- Press `r` â†’ Rescan the current page
- Press `Ctrl/Cmd+A` â†’ Select all files
- Press `Escape` â†’ Deselect all files

### Filter Options

- **All files**: Show all detected downloadable files
- **Documents**: Show only document files
- **Archives**: Show only compressed/archive files
- **Media**: Show only audio, video, and image files
- **Code**: Show only code and data files

### What This Extension Does

- âœ… **Content Scanning**: Analyzes webpage DOM for downloadable file links
- âœ… **Smart Detection**: Identifies files by extension and context
- âœ… **Bulk Downloads**: Uses Chrome Downloads API for efficient downloading
- âœ… **Visual Feedback**: Real-time progress and status updates
- âœ… **Page Integration**: Highlights links directly on the webpage
- âœ… **Error Handling**: Graceful handling of permissions and network issues

## ğŸ”§ Development

### Adding Icons (Optional)

Currently, the extension works without custom icons and will use Chrome's default extension icon. To add custom icons:

1. Create PNG files in these sizes in the `icons/` directory:
   - `icon16.png` (16x16 pixels)
   - `icon32.png` (32x32 pixels)
   - `icon48.png` (48x48 pixels)
   - `icon128.png` (128x128 pixels)

2. Add the icon references back to `manifest.json`:
   ```json
   "action": {
     "default_popup": "popup.html",
     "default_title": "All Link Downloader",

       "16": "icons/icon16.png",
       "32": "icons/icon32.png",

   }
   ```

3. Use online tools like:

### Modifying the Extension

1. **Edit Files**: Modify `popup.html`, `popup.css`, or `popup.js`
2. **Reload Extension**: Go to `chrome://extensions/` and click the reload icon
3. **Test Changes**: Click the extension icon to see your changes

To expand this extension, you can:

// All Link Downloader - Popup Script
// Handles the popup interface and coordinates with content script for file downloading

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
